column1: # This CSV exercises ALL encoding rules at their boundaries
# Timestamps are at 300-second (5-minute) intervals from EPOCH_BASE (1760000000)
# SECTION 7: Zero Run - 7 zeros (max individual bits: 7 x 1-bit = 7 bits)
# SECTION 8: Zero Run - 8 zeros (min 8-bit run: 1110xxxx where xxxx=0)
# SECTION 9: Zero Run - 21 zeros (max 8-bit run: 1110xxxx where xxxx=13)
# SECTION 10: Zero Run - 22 zeros (min 12-bit run: 11110xxxxxxx where xxxxxxx=0)
# SECTION 11: Gap - 1 interval (13-bit encoding: 1111111xxxxxx where xxxxxx=0)
# SECTION 12: Gap - 64 intervals (max single gap encoding: 1111111xxxxxx where xxxxxx=63)
# SECTION 13: Mixed sequence to test transitions between encoding types
